content: same as for left warmer this pattern is copyrighted to julee reeves september 2nd 2008 pattern is for personal gifts and that sort of thing and charity use only if you would like to sell the finished item please contact me for permission if permission to sell the finished item is granted it may not be sold online only at craft fairs farmers markets etc and it may not be sold in idaho or montana without my express permission thank you julee reeves j r designs
